pages.text: $(li)Guardians are pufferfish-like hostile creatures that spawn in and around $(l:patchouli:structures/ocean_monument)Ocean Monuments$(/l).$(br)$(li)This creature will charge a powerful laser that will inflict you damage after charging it for a few seconds.$(br)$(li)You will receive damage if you hit this creature too.
$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_cod)Raw Cods$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/prismarine_crystals)Prismarine Crystals$(/l) upon death.
